bibl.title: Three Christian Epitaphs in Greek from the Reisner Excavations in the Area of Gebel Barkal (Northern Sudan).
bibl.note: 1-2. Photos published by D. DUNHAM, The Royal Cemeteries of Kush. II: Nuri (Boston, 1965) pl. LXXIA (inscription unpublished) and LXXIB [ed.: Stanley M. BURSTEIN, A Christian Greek Inscription from Nuri in the Sudan, Graeco-Africana. Studies in the History of Greek Relations with Egypt and Nubia (New Rochelle, 1995) pp. 221-229 et pl.] - 3. Herman JUNKER, Die griechische Grabinschrift von Gebel Barkal, ZNTW 37 (1939) pp. 281-285 (= S.B. V, 8948).
bibl.seg: LAJTAR Adam, Three Christian Epitaphs in Greek from the Reisner Excavations in the Area of Gebel Barkal (Northern Sudan).
